title: Earnings in conflict
brief_description: A proposal by Lord Wilfred Brown to combat the wages inflation in Great Britain. The narrative is set in the future, at a time when such a system has been adopted. An American TV interviewer is the linkman, making an enquiry into the “revolutionary” British procedure.
